TopicTitle: Fuel Lines Issue - A heads Up

Articles.Content: Found an issue with the fuel lines in the .90 release. If you place a fuel line too close to its partner it will reverse the direction of the arrows that you intended to route. I fixed it by giving the fuel line more slack. Hope maybe the devs can fix later or there is a mod that can make really short fuel lines.

Pictures would be awesome so we can see exactly what you're talking about and replicate. Nice find!

Cheers,

~Claw
